DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the safety and efficacy of the GORE® CARDIOFORM ASD Occluder in the percutaneous closure of ostium secundum atrial septal defects (ASDs)
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Transcatheter Closure of Ostium Secundum ASDs
DOC.detailed_description: This is a prospective, multicenter, single-arm clinical study comparing outcomes with the GORE® CARDIOFORM ASD Occluder to performance goals derived from clinical investigation outcomes for devices indicated for ASD closure.
DOC.criteria: Appropriate ASD anatomy Note: Additional Inclusion Criteria may apply Absence of concurrent cardiac conditions that could elevate morbidity/mortality beyond what is common for ASD Note: Additional Exclusion Criteria may apply
